card.text: Plague Rats's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures named Plague Rats on the battlefield. (This token's mana cost is {2}{B}.)

card.name: FSH Draft Archetypes FSH
card.text: {W}{U} EXPLORE The Cursed City is full of wonders; explore your way to riches. {U}{B} UNCOVER Great treasure is buried in the ruins. Unearth it for glory. {B}{R} GRAVEYARD The dead do not rest easy. Cards leaving your graveyard will matter. {R}{G} DIG Beneath the surface, bones and gold are both easily found. {G}{W} BATTLES Encounters offer a fresh challenge. Assert your dominance in battle. {W}{B} GRIND Smaller, nimbler creatures will triumph through recursion. {B}{G} RATS Rats. {G}{U} EXPLORE Comb through the ruins of Morstad and make your lands matter. {U}{R} ARTIFACTS Uncover new Relics and return them from the grave. {R}{W} TOKENS Encounters, Treasure, and the dig mechanic will bring you victory.

card.name: Seer's Crystal
card.text: When you uncover this Relic, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) {U}, {T}, Sacrifice Seer's Crystal: Draw a card.

card.name: Hidden Sigil
card.text: When you uncover this Relic, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Bone Totem
card.text: When you uncover this Relic, put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control. {1}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Bone Totem: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Chaos Medallion
card.text: When you uncover this Relic, up to one target creature can't block this turn. {1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Chaos Medallion: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Fleshcrafter's Orb
card.text: When you uncover this Relic, each opponent loses 1 life. {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Fleshcrafter's Orb: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Profane Portal
card.text: Profane Portal enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. {2}, Discard Profane Portal: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Moldering Market
card.text: Moldering Market enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}. {2}, Discard Moldering Market: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Hazardous Hulk
card.text: Hazardous Hulk enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. {2}, Discard Hazardous Hulk: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Broken Beacon
card.text: Broken Beacon enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. {2}, Discard Broken Beacon: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Treacherous Tower
card.text: Treacherous Tower enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}. {2}, Discard Treacherous Tower: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Treasure FSH
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Peer into the Nightpit (Headliner promo)
card.text: Draw up to one hundred cards.

card.name: Wizard FSH
card.text: When this creature enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Fool's Crown
card.text: When you uncover this Relic, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may sacrifice Fool's Crown. If you do, until your next turn, no more than one creature can attack each combat and no more than one creature can block each combat.

card.name: Dragon FSH
card.text: Flying, trample

card.name: Gnawbone, Skurl Prophet (Bundle promo)
card.text: Ward—Sacrifice a land. At the beginning of each end step, create a number of Plague Rats tokens equal to the number of players who lost life this turn.

card.name: Hedge Maze
card.text: ({T}: Add {G} or {U}.) Hedge Maze enters the battlefield tapped. When Hedge Maze enters the battlefield, surveil 1.

card.name: Underground Mortuary
card.text: ({T}: Add {B} or {G}.) Underground Mortuary enters the battlefield tapped. When Underground Mortuary enters the battlefield, surveil 1.

card.name: Thundering Falls
card.text: ({T}: Add {U} or {R}.) Thundering Falls enters the battlefield tapped. When Thundering Falls enters the battlefield, surveil 1.

card.name: Shadowy Backstreet
card.text: ({T}: Add {W} or {B}.) Shadowy Backstreet enters the battlefield tapped. When Shadowy Backstreet enters the battlefield, surveil 1.

card.name: Effigy of Agony
card.text: When you uncover this Relic, target creature can't block this turn. {R}, {T}, Sacrifice Effigy of Agony and another artifact: Search your library for an artifact card with mana value equal to 1 plus the other sacrificed artifact's mana value, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.
